verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <WH4427> reigneth תָּגֵ֣ל <WH1523> rejoice הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> let the earth יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ <WH8055> be glad אִיִּ֥ים <WH339> of isles רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> let the multitude

עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> Clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל <WH6205> and darkness סְבִיבָ֑יו <WH5439> [are] round about צֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> him righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <WH4349> [are] the habitation כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> of his throne
אֵ֭שׁ <WH784> A fire לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> goes וּתְלַהֵ֖ט <WH3857> him and burneth up סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> round about צָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> his enemies
הֵאִ֣ירוּ <WH215> enlightened בְרָקָ֣יו <WH1300> His lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> the world רָאֲתָ֖ה <WH7200> saw וַתָּחֵ֣ל <WH2342> and trembled הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

הָרִ֗ים <WH2022> The hills כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג <WH1749> like wax נָ֭מַסּוּ <WH4549> melted מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> at the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <WH6440> at the presence אֲד֣וֹן <WH113> of the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the whole earth

הִגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> declare הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> The heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> his righteousness וְרָא֖וּ <WH7200> see כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> and all the people כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> his glory

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ ׀ <WH954> Confounded כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹ֬בְדֵי <WH5647> be all they that serve פֶ֗סֶל <WH6459> graven images הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים <WH1984> that boast בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים <WH457> themselves of idols הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> worship ל֝וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> him all [ye] gods

שָׁמְעָ֬ה <WH8085> heard וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח ׀ <WH8055> and was glad צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> Zion וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה <WH1523> rejoiced בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> and the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> Because מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <WH4941> because of thy judgments יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> For thou LORD עֶלְי֥וֹן <WH5945> [art] high above עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> all the earth מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> far above נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ <WH5927> thou art exalted עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> all gods

אֹהֲבֵ֥י <WH157> Ye that love יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD שִׂנְא֫וּ <WH8130> hate רָ֥ע <WH7451> evil שֹׁ֭מֵר <WH8104> he preserveth נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <WH5315> the souls חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> of his saints מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> them out of the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <WH5337> he delivereth
א֭וֹר <WH216> Light זָרֻ֣עַ <WH2232> is sown לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> for the righteous וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> for the upright לֵ֥ב <WH3820> in heart שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> and gladness

שִׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <WH3034> and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> of his holiness
